name: Celebi

ancientTrait.name: θ Stop
ancientTrait.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Leap Through Time
abilities.text: When this Pokémon is Knocked Out, flip a coin. If heads, shuffle this Pokémon and all cards attached to it into your deck, and your opponent can't take any Prize cards for it.

attacks.name: Sparkle Motion
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokémon.

flavorText: It has the power to travel across time, but it is said to appear only in peaceful times.
